# Vendored libraries
Modified version of Rocq libraries containing changes needed in Peregrine that haven't been upstreamed yet.

## coq-ceres
https://github.com/Lysxia/coq-ceres

Fork containing minor fixes, changes to escape sequences and utf-8 parsing. Ports the development to be based on MetaRocq bytestring representation.

## CertiCoq
https://github.com/CertiCoq/certicoq

Port to Rocq 9.0.0

## rocq-verified-extraction
https://github.com/MetaRocq/rocq-verified-extraction

Verified OCaml extraction library. Fork ported to the bystring based coq-ceres version.

## rocq-typed-extraction
Library containing Rust and Elm extraction backends.
Forked version contains port to Rocq 9.0.0, various clean up and changes related to Peregrine integration.
